None.Name: Acid Spit
None.Description: Activate to knock enemy units off walls. Affected wall segments cannot be mounted again for 15 seconds. Deals 850 damage to walls and 30 damage to units. Additionally the damage bonus against structures applies as well. Reusable every 20 seconds.

None.Name: Tunneling
None.Description: Activate to teleport to the Tunnel Exit (if it exists). Reusable every 20 seconds.
